General.Name: Furonteer Inc.
General.Description: FURONTEER Inc. manufactures and sells ADAS/autonomous sensing camera assembly and test equipment for automotive and mobile application. It offers ADAS sensing camera assembly equipment, ADAS sensing camera testing equipment, mobile actuator testing equipment, and 3D ToF camera assembly and testing equipment. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Seongnam, South Korea.
